caption:
This photograph depicts a tranquil scene with a group of flamingos standing amidst lush greenery. There are five flamingos in total, prominent in the foreground of the image. They are positioned on a grassy area with their iconic bent necks and slender legs visible, showcasing their distinctive pink and orange feathers.

The background is composed of dense, varied greenery including trees and shrubs, suggesting a rich, natural environment. Further back, a mountain with a somewhat obscured peak due to mist or low clouds can be seen, enhancing the sense of a secluded, peaceful habitat likely far from urban areas. The lighting in the photograph suggests an overcast day, with the colors appearing soft and the overall atmosphere calm and serene.
title: Paradise Park, a commercial enterprise designed to display some of the natural beauty of the island, is in a conservation district which is primarily forest and water reserve land. The State Department of Land and Natural Resources controls land use in "conservation" zones.
